name: The Exit Project: Backstreets
detailed_description:
The Exit Project: Backstreets is a first-person psychological horror game where you're trapped in an endlessly repeating street. Break free by identifying what's wrong with each iteration.
Key Features:

  • Memory-based challenge: Learn the street's original state and spot differences to find your path home

  • Master 10 consecutive correct choices to escape the loop

  • Various anomalies: Encounter missing objects, supernatural occurrences, unsettling sounds, and unexpected scares

  • Immersive atmospheric horror that tests your perception and memory

You are trapped in a very strange place and need to find your way out. Every detail and inconsistency is important to break out of this senseless and frightening cycle. If you've opened the door at the end of the street and it's not your house, you've missed something.
Break the loop. Find what's strange around you. Someone else has escaped this place before you. So can you.
Playtime: 20-60 minutes Full controller support and customizable graphics settings.

short_description: In this mind-bending puzzle game, you are trapped in a place that looks ordinary but hides strange and unsettling mysteries. With each step you take, you find yourself back where you started. To escape, you'll need to scrutinize every detail, unravel inconsistencies, and break the endless cycle.
